about.title: SpawnijMiTo
about.subTitle: Learn more about
about.descriptionText: We are a Polish manufacturer of industrial furniture, lofts, Hi-fi audio tables, and speaker stands.
about.descriptionText2: Imagine your design, and we will take care of the rest!

01-Table-Hi_Fi.title: Hi-fi Table
01-Table-Hi_Fi.shortDescription: Solid steel construction made of 40x40 and 40x30 steel profiles, powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Oak tops with a thickness of 30 mm, equipped with low spikes and gold-colored pads.
01-Table-Hi_Fi.description: Solid steel construction made of 40x40 and 40x30 steel profiles, powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Oak tops with a thickness of 30 mm, equipped with low spikes and gold-colored pads.

02-Table-XXL.title: XXL TV Stand
02-Table-XXL.shortDescription: Tops made of oak wood, oiled in a clear color. Powder-coated construction in matte black with a fine texture. Black spikes with black pads.
02-Table-XXL.description: Tops made of oak wood, oiled in a clear color. Powder-coated construction in matte black with a fine texture. Black spikes with black pads.

03-Table-Hi_Fi-2.title: Short Hi-fi Table
03-Table-Hi_Fi-2.shortDescription: Made of powder-coated steel and oak tops in natural color. The whole set is complemented by black spikes and black pads.
03-Table-Hi_Fi-2.description: Made of powder-coated steel and oak tops in natural color. The whole set is complemented by black spikes and black pads.

04-Audio.title: Audio Equipment Rack
04-Audio.shortDescription: Shelves made of oak wood, slightly oiled in a clear shade. Construction powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Black spikes with black pads.
04-Audio.description: Shelves made of oak wood, slightly oiled in a clear shade. Construction powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Black spikes with black pads.

05-Spikes.title: Anti-Vibration Spikes
05-Spikes.shortDescription: Our products utilize anti-vibration spikes, which reduce the transmission of vibrations between the surface and the devices.
05-Spikes.description: Our products utilize anti-vibration spikes, which reduce the transmission of vibrations between the surface and the devices.

06-Cabinet-TV.title: Industrial TV Cabinet
06-Cabinet-TV.shortDescription: Cabinet made of nearly 50-year-old oak wood, covered with a layer of oil wax. Legs made of closed profile and expanded mesh, secured with clear lacquer.
06-Cabinet-TV.description: Cabinet made of nearly 50-year-old oak wood, covered with a layer of oil wax. Legs made of closed profile and expanded mesh, secured with clear lacquer.

07-Stands-Speaker.title: Speaker Stands
07-Stands-Speaker.shortDescription: Stands with reinforced construction made of 40x30 profile powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture.
07-Stands-Speaker.description: Stands with reinforced construction made of 40x30 profile powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture.

08-Table-Audio.title: Layered Audio Table
08-Table-Audio.shortDescription: Table made of 40x30 profile powder-coated in matte black. Shelves made of laminated board in matte black.
08-Table-Audio.description: Table made of 40x30 profile powder-coated in matte black. Shelves made of laminated board in matte black.

09-Stands.title: Stands
09-Stands.shortDescription: Stands made of 40x20 profile and 30 mm thick oak wood in cherry color.
09-Stands.description: Stands made of 40x20 profile and 30 mm thick oak wood in cherry color.

10-Stands-Steel.title: Steel Stands
10-Stands-Steel.shortDescription: Stands made of 40x30 profile and 5 mm thick steel plate.
10-Stands-Steel.description: Stands made of 40x30 profile and 5 mm thick steel plate.

11-Desk-Modern.title: Modern Desk
11-Desk-Modern.shortDescription: Steel frame made of 50x30 profile. Powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Top made of laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.
11-Desk-Modern.description: Steel frame made of 50x30 profile. Powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Top made of laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.

12-Cabinet-TV.title: Audio TV Cabinet
12-Cabinet-TV.shortDescription: This time, a cabinet for equipment combining black steel and tops made of laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.
12-Cabinet-TV.description: This time, a cabinet for equipment combining black steel and tops made of laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.

13-Cabinet-Bar.title: Cabinet with Bar
13-Cabinet-Bar.shortDescription: Entirely made of 30x30 profile and crimped mesh powder-coated in matte black. Fully filled with mesh and reinforced flooring. Doors open upwards on struts and prepared for a padlock.
13-Cabinet-Bar.description: Entirely made of 30x30 profile and crimped mesh powder-coated in matte black. Fully filled with mesh and reinforced flooring. Doors open upwards on struts and prepared for a padlock.

14-Cabinet-Clothing.title: Shoe and Clothing Cabinet
14-Cabinet-Clothing.shortDescription: Cabinet made of profile mesh and laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.
14-Cabinet-Clothing.description: Cabinet made of profile mesh and laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.

15-Armchair.title: Industrial Armchair
15-Armchair.shortDescription: Armchair with a simple, lightweight construction and modern design. Equipped with thick, stain-resistant cushions and powder-coated construction for durability and comfort.
15-Armchair.description: Armchair with a simple, lightweight construction and modern design. Equipped with thick, stain-resistant cushions and powder-coated construction for durability and comfort.

16-Table-Audio-Hi-Fi-54.title: Hi-Fi Audio Table 54
16-Table-Audio-Hi-Fi-54.shortDescription: The Hi-Fi Audio Table 54 is an elegant piece of furniture that combines natural oak wood with minimalist design and metal details, designed for functional and stylish storage of audio equipment.
16-Table-Audio-Hi-Fi-54.description:
This audio table combines the natural beauty of oak wood with a modern, minimalist design. The shelves, made of high-quality oak, feature a distinct grain, warm tone, and durability, making the piece both aesthetically pleasing and solid.

The base is supported by unique spikes that hold the shelves, adding lightness and a striking visual effect. The spikes are made of metal in gold or black, creating a contrast with the natural wood tone and emphasizing the table's modern character.

The table is designed with functionality in mind ‚Äì it provides a stable surface for audio equipment while allowing for better air circulation around devices, which is important for their proper operation.

Thanks to the combination of natural materials and minimalist form, the table fits perfectly in both modern and more classic interiors, adding elegance and sophistication.

Construction: tapered legs, 30x30 profile for the legs, and 30x20 for the crossbars. Powder-coated in matte black. Gold spikes. Shelves finished with a special hard wax oil.

Dimensions:
Total width: 54 cm
Depth: 44 cm
Height: 60 cm
Lower shelves: 47 cm wide, 40 cm deep
Shelf spacing: lower 13 cm, upper 18 cm

The identical table costs 1699 PLN plus 150 PLN shipping.

services.subtitle: Discover
services.title: Our Products
services.projectDescription: We create custom projects tailored to the client's expected dimensions.
services.tablesDescription: Made from natural wood or laminated board.
services.structureDescription: Welded from profiles, ground, and powder-coated.

reviews.review: I struggled with various budget tables until I found this company. I highly recommend it. Contact, project arrangements, shipping... everything at the highest level üëçüòä Ps. I've already ordered a second one.
Solidly designed cabinet, you can see the thought put into it, and the craftsmanship is excellent. Congratulations! üòè
Top-notch craftsmanship, great contact, very reasonable price. This is my first piece of furniture from this company, but certainly not the last. I highly recommend it.
